title: Maintain current form structure

requirements.text: Preserve the existing registration form layout and structure, ensuring all current form fields (full name, email, phone number, membership type, and dynamic custom fields) remain in their current visual arrangement and styling
acceptanceCriteria: Registration form maintains its current field order and layout
All existing form fields (standard and dynamic) continue to render correctly
Form styling and visual presentation remain unchanged
Form validation behavior remains consistent with current implementation

constraints: Do not modify the registration form component structure
Do not change form field ordering or layout
Preserve current form styling and theme
